name: Air Filter Replacement
description: Replace or clean air filters to ensure proper airflow, improve indoor air quality, and maintain system efficiency.

name: Coil Cleaning
description: Clean evaporator and condenser coils to remove dirt and debris, ensuring optimal heat transfer and energy efficiency.

name: Lubrication of Moving Parts
description: Lubricate bearings and other moving parts in motors and fans to reduce friction, prevent wear, and extend equipment life.

name: Thermostat Calibration
description: Calibrate thermostat settings to ensure accurate temperature control, optimize energy usage, and prevent system overcycling.

name: Drain Line Cleaning
description: Flush and clean condensate drain lines to prevent clogs, algae growth, and potential water damage.

name: Compressor Repair
description: Diagnose and repair compressor failures, including replacing faulty components such as valves or capacitors.

name: Refrigerant Leak Repair
description: Locate and seal refrigerant leaks using detectors, then recharge the system to specified levels for proper cooling.

name: Blower Motor Replacement
description: Replace a failed blower motor to restore air circulation, including wiring and mounting adjustments as needed.

name: Electrical Control Repair
description: Repair or replace damaged electrical controls, such as relays, contactors, or circuit boards, to ensure safe operation.

name: Ductwork Leak Repair
description: Seal leaks in ductwork using mastic or tape to improve system efficiency, reduce energy loss, and enhance indoor air quality.

name: Vibration Analysis
description: Monitor vibration levels in motors and fans using sensors to detect imbalances or bearing wear for early intervention.

name: Infrared Thermography
description: Use thermal imaging cameras to identify hotspots in electrical components and insulation, indicating potential failures.

name: Oil Analysis
description: Analyze oil samples from compressors for contaminants and wear particles to predict mechanical failures and schedule repairs.

name: Performance Data Monitoring
description: Continuously monitor system parameters like temperature, pressure, and airflow to detect deviations and optimize performance.

name: Acoustic Emission Testing
description: Use sound analysis equipment to detect abnormal noises from components, indicating early signs of wear or failure.
